title: Patreon Announcement
itunes:title: Patreon Announcement
itunes:subtitle: patreon.com/rustyquill
description:
Head to patreon.com/rustyquill and you can help to support us from just $1 a month. If you can spare a little more there’s all sorts of bonus content available at the 2, 5 and 10 dollar levels, including early access to ad-free versions of our episodes and bonus material from both The Magnus Archives and The Rusty Quill Gaming Podcast, including character sheets and archive transcripts. It’s taken a lot of money to get things to this stage, and anything you can give will help us to develop the company even more, giving us access to a dedicated recording space, better equipment and the time to create even more podcasts, videos and webcomics. If you want to help out go to patreon.com/rustyquill. We really, really appreciate your enthusiasm and support you’ve all shown us since we started, and we hope to be able to provide you with excellent entertainment for years to come! Get bonus content on Patreon

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
